name: duplicate
description: This issue or pull request already exists

name: don't merge
description: Please don't merge this functionality temporarily

name: hotfix
description: Major bug fix that should be merged ASAP

name: investigating
description: This behavior is still being tested out

name: review/WaitingForInfo
description: Issue is not actionable because of missing required information, which needs to be provided.

name: review/NeedsDecision
description: Feedback is required from experts, contributors, and/or the community before a change can be made.

name: review/NeedsFix
description: The path to resolution is known, but the work has not been done.

name: review/NeedsInvestigation
description: Someone must examine and confirm this is a valid issue and not a duplicate of an existing one.
